abstract: Australian authorities arrest Adam Brookman, nurse who claims he was forced to work with Islamic State militants while in Syria, upon his return to Sydney; Brookman claims he escaped group and crossed border into Turkey.
lead_paragraph: Adam Brookman, who says he was wounded in an airstrike and then forced to work with ISIS, was arrested at the Sydney airport, the Australian police said.

headline.main: Australia Arrests Nurse Who Says He Worked With ISIS Under Duress
headline.print_headline: Australian Who Says He Was Forced to Help ISIS Is Arrested

snippet: Adam Brookman, who says he was wounded in an airstrike and then forced to work with ISIS, was arrested at the Sydney airport, the Australian police said.

keywords.value: Islamic State in Iraq and Syria (ISIS)
keywords.name: organizations
